snippet.title: Mansion Mystery Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive into 'Mansion Mystery,' an immersive VR puzzler. In a haunted mansion governed by real-world physics, ignite matches, shatter plates, solve intricate puzzles. Will you unravel the secrets and escape or be trapped forever?

Try out free demo or purchase the full version Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2424630/Mansion_Mystery/
